sentences.sContent: I think you should bracket this word.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think you should bracket this word.
sentences.sCn: 我认为你应该给这个字加上括号。

sentences.sContent: So for example, tags like or must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.sContent_eng: So for example, tags like or must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.sCn: 所以，例如，从上面的JSP接受的如或这样的标记必须有一个闭括号，如清单8 所示。

synos.tran: 支架；括号；墙上凸出的托架
括在一起；把…归入同一类；排除

phrases.pCn: 钢支架，钢角码；钢制肘板

trans.tranOther: one of the pair of signs ( ) put around words to show extra information
